page.title: 10Buses
page.content: There is one daily bus route in our area the X51, which runs to Cheltenham to Cirencester and Swindon. I found out that not many people use the buses. I think it is because if the people had lots of shopping they would have to walk about 0.75 km to get to the bus stop which is on the main A435 and when you get there it may be gone or not there yet.Nearly all the people said they did not use the bus because it comes every 2 hours which is not very convenient and so you would have a very long walk back if you missed it.There is a new bus called the{ {Tuesday Bus.}It always runs on a Tuesday.It comes right into the village.Still,only one person uses it.It goes to different villages.More people get on the bus in these other villages.It stops outside the{Post {Office.}If no-one boards it drives on.
